content.description: It's basically all choss. But climbing choss is an art you must master. Similar to the route name it starts off easy and exciting but things quickly begin to fall apart anytime you get too comfortable. Definitely the best climb out here and the only one that makes it worth coming back.
content.location: The biggest overhanging face on the rock islands

content.description: The climbing a bit chossy in some areas but it’s free access so I guess you get why you pay for, especially with this limestone. The rock is the remanence of a house built on an unsafe cliff which fell into the lake. The area is pretty popular as boats come by constantly to show their buddies “that’s where the house fell into the lake on the news”. That said you’ll rarely ever find climbers out there just a few cliff divers like the rest of lake Whitney.
